name: Corrupted (itch)
description:
The Game

Corrupted is a survival castle defender, packed with explosions, gore and hordes of disgusting monsters. Play in 5 different game modes and unlock a variety of awesome power-ups to get you to the top of the leaderboards. This is our second project and we'd love to hear all about your experience!

The Developer

Neo Entertainment is an indie game developer, consisting of two people. We like to make games in our spare time and it warms our hearts to see other people enjoying them as much as we do. Feedback is always welcome!
